LanguageData.VFEA_AncientMonitorBank.label: стародавня моніторингова панель
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientMonitorBank.description: A small set of old computer screens.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientBrokenDefensiveTurret.label: стародавня зламана захисна турель

LanguageData.VFEA_AncientBustedTurretPlatform.descrip: A destroyed platform for a turret.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientFuelTank.label: стара паливна цистерна
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientFuelTank.description: A large fuel tank that can be deconstructed for fuel.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientInputTerminal.label: старовинний термінал
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientInputTerminal.description: A station with buttons and levers.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientTransmitter.label: старий радіочастотний передавач
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientTransmitter.description: A transmitter used to send signals over long range.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientMachinery.label: старовинний механічний блок
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientMachinery.description: A set of old machine blocks. Their purpose, if they ever had any, has long been forgotten.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientWaterFilter.label: старовинний водяний фільтр

LanguageData.VFEA_AncientComputerDesk.description: An old, no longer operational computer desk.

LanguageData.VFEA_AncientShuttle.description: An ancient, no longer operational shuttle that can be disassembled for scrap.
